meanings.definition: A thin sheet or layer of tissue that covers or lines a part of the body.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the membranes in our bodies protect important organs.
meanings.sent2: She carefully peeled off the membranes from the chicken before cooking it.
meanings.sent3: The membranes in the body are like tiny shields, guarding our insides.
meanings.sent4: As delicate as butterfly wings, the membranes fluttered in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The membranes, like invisible barriers, shielded the fragile tissues within.

meanings.definition: A thin, pliable sheet or layer of material.
meanings.sent1: The artist used membranes of different colors to create a beautiful collage.
meanings.sent2: He wrapped the fragile item in soft membranes to protect it during shipping.
meanings.sent3: The membranes of fabric rustled softly in the wind, like whispers.
meanings.sent4: The old book was wrapped in ancient membranes, preserving its secrets.
meanings.sent5: The delicate membranes of the bubble wrap kept the glass safe during transport.
